page.title: 02L'pool,Newsham_Education
page.content: Falling rolls in inner city have affected secondary education. Area is served by 3 major single_sex comprehensive schools, 2 boys' 1 girls'. City council re_organisation affects all schools in city barring 1 boys' and 1 girls' comprehensive (both in our area) which at insistence of central government will remain single_sex. All other secondary schools outside Roman Catholic sector to be mixed "community schools". Roman Catholic provision in city high owing to historical circumstances having given Liverpool almost 50% Roman Catholic population. Recent Roman Catholic re_organisation has closed the one R.C.Secondary school in the area owing to falling child population.
